node.title: Planning for the 2026 Winter Games is already underway.
node.alt: Italian Olympic officials in 2019 after Milan and Cortina d’Ampezzo were selected to host the 2026 Winter Games.
node.description: Milan and Cortina d’Ampezzo, Italy, will host the next event, where two million visitors are expected.
node.content: ["First, Beijing 2022. Then, Milano Cortina 2026.", "Plans are already underway for the 2026 Winter Olympics in Milan, the economic and fashion capital, and the Italian ski resort of Cortina d\u2019Ampezzo.", "The Italian organizers have been coordinating with China, and the winter torch will be passed at the end of the Beijing Games. Even the food is being considered. The Italian delegation in Beijing brought two chefs from Cortina \u2014 including Graziano Prest, who earned a Michelin star \u2014 to cook at its hospitality houses in Beijing and Yanqing and serve up regional specialties like a beet-stuffed ravioli.", "According to the International Olympic Committee, two million spectators are expected at the competition venues in Italy. Events will be held across the northern part of the country \u2014 Milan, Cortina, Verona, Val di Fiemme, Valtellina and Anterselva. Cortina, which hosted the Winter Games in 1956, will welcome Olympians for a second time. Turin hosted in 2006.", "The 2024 Summer Games will be held in Paris. Organizers approved a plan to hold the opening ceremony in the middle of the city instead of in a stadium, with athletes floating down the Seine in a parade of boats."]
